definitions.text: a set of two similar things considered as a unit
two items of the same kind
two people considered as a unit
a poker hand with 2 cards of the same value

examples: The two old friends paired off

definitions.text: bring two objects, ideas, or people together
examples: This fact is coupled to the other one
Matchmaker, can you match my daughter with a nice young man?
The student was paired with a partner for collaboration on the project
